statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT max_quantity, min_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity < 20 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity, max_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity < max_quantity AND min_quantity < 10
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 30 AND 60 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity <= min_quantity
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock_level > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock_level FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock_level BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock_level, date_recorded FROM inventory_tracking JOIN stock_history ON inventory_tracking.product_id = stock_history.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock_level FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AS today_date FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock_level <= 10;
SELECT ih.record_id, it.product_name, ih.stock_level, ih.date_recorded FROM inventory_tracking it INNER JOIN stock_history ih ON it.product_id = ih.product_id ORDER BY ih.date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock_level;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock_level;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Inventory.product_name, Orders.order_quantity FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, restock_date, restock_quantity FROM restock_history ORDER BY restock_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < restock_level ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > (SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM inventory);
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels
SELECT * FROM stock_updates ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC
SELECT item_name, current_stock, minimum_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock
SELECT item_name, current_stock, minimum_stock FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY item_name
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity_added) AS total_added FROM inventory_levels JOIN stock_updates ON inventory_levels.item_id = stock_updates.item_id GROUP BY item_name;
SELECT item_name, alert_message FROM stock_alerts JOIN inventory_levels ON stock_alerts.item_id = inventory_levels.item_id WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock;
SELECT item_name, tracking_timestamp FROM stock_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY tracking_timestamp DESC;
